## Getting Started

### Installing & Loading R Packages

In this section, I will install and load tidyverse & sf packages

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse,sf)
```

## Importing a Geospatial data in shapefile format

```{r}
mpsz <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial",
                layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

### Plotting the Geospatial Data

```{r}
#| echo: false # eval false will hide the plot, echo false will hide the code
plot(mpsz)
```
